attributes.action: take appropriate actions to remove Robert Mugabe from power and restore democracy to Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: surely the time has come to remove this vile dictator from power and support the Zimbabwean  people to build a democracy which is safe and supportive of its people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
